articles.title: Simon Property stock falls 5.1% after Fitch downgraded to A- - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Simon Property Group (NYSE:SPG) drops 5.1% after Fitch Ratings cuts the shopping mall operator's credit ratings to A- from A, citing its view that SPG's credit metric will remain weak due to the stress on its tenant roster and the majority debt-funded acquisi…
